description:
These are the utilities I install on a fresh Windows dev machine.

      I recommend you set a user environment variable of "chocolatey_bin_root" with a value of "bin" or "tools" etc. This prevents packages like Ruby from installing in the root of C:.

      The easiest way to set chocolatey_bin_root is to execute cinst binroot, then open a new console or restart your current console before installing this package.

      Be patient. This package takes a long time to finish.

      If possible, disable UAC before installing this package so that it can run unattended. Otherwise, you will have to approve each application's install.
summary: Utilities for a Windows dev machine.
author: H. Alan Stevens
